author: mverzett
body:
This PR introduces the following:
   * DeepCMVA in the RECO Default content
   * DeepCSV/DeepCMVA in the miniAOD default content 
   * DeepCSV training for Phase I: removes the probcc discriminators and changes treatment of default values

This PR depends on [this](https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/pull/5) in RecoBTag-Combined to work properly
title: Phase I Deep CSV Training
